text: Ki tusim usa bade nu nahim dekhi'a jisa ne usa de raba de sabadha vica ibarahima nala taraka-vitaraka kita, ki'unki alaha ne usa nu hakumata diti si. Jadom ibarahima ne kiha ki mera raba uha hai jo jivata karada hai ate mauta dida hai. Uha boli'a ki maim vi jivana dida ham ate mauta dida ham. Ibarahima ne kiha ki alaha suraja nu puraba vicom kadhada hai tusim usa nu pachama vicom kadha devo. Tam uha avagi'akari haka-baka rahi gi'a. Alaha ati'azari'am nu raha nahim dikha'unda
